mapper.sql: SYMN_ID, SYMN_LNM, SYMN_PNM, SYMN_DCD, STWD_ID, SBSWD_LNM, SBSWD_PNM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into WAM_SYMN
SYMN_ID,
SYMN_LNM,
SYMN_PNM,
SYMN_DCD,
STWD_ID,
SBSWD_LNM,
SBSWD_PNM,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{symnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{symnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{symnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{symnDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sbswdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sbswdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAM_SYMN WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND (SYMN_LNM = #{symnLnm} OR SYMN_LNM = UPPER(#{symnLnm}) OR SYMN_PNM = #{symnPnm} OR SYMN_PNM = UPPER(#{symnPnm}))
